Class WPouchOrientationDetection

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class WPouchOrientationDetection
extends StructureDetectionModule
    Identifies the orientation of the wing (A/P and D/V directions).
    Version:
    October 24, 2011
    Author:
    Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com), Ricard Delgado-Gonzalo (ricard.delg...@gmail.com)

      • setOrientationFromCompartmentCenterOfMass

        public void setOrientationFromCompartmentCenterOfMass(WPouchStructure structure,
                                             java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double[] coms)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the orientation of the structure from the snake and the center of mass of each compartment. The centers of mass must be arranged in this order: DA, DP, VA, VP.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
